Date: Thursday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Progress of Tsuyoshi Shinjo
Dear Sir,
Tsuyoshi Shinjo is hitting the ball well at AA Carolina Mudcats!
He has an AVG of .309, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
